column2: Aetna to exit California's individual insurance market June 15 Aetna Inc said on Saturday it has notified California's insurance regulator that it plans to stop selling health policies to individual consumers in the state at the end of 2013.

column2: Wal-Mart taps Cash as new presiding director
column3: replacing Breyer June 15 Wal-Mart Stores Inc said on Saturday that its board has appointed James Cash Jr. as lead independent director.
